item.title: Blog index
item.description: Index Hello, and welcome to my corner on the internet. My name is Jens Lordén and I am a software engineer/ML Engineer/MLOps Enineer/Game developer located in Stockholm, Sweden. I currently work as a MLOps Engineer at Tele2, formerly a machine learning engineer formerly a game developer.

item.title: Why i like dbt and why you should too
item.description: Dbt (or data build tool) transforms the way you work with sql, if you are someone like me that comes from a software engineering background then you will feel at home with the dbt workflow. So let’s get to it, first what is dbt? Dbt is an open-source command line tool that helps analysts and engineers transform data in their warehouse more effectively. Ok this is what dbt is according to wikipedia, but lets try to get a little better understanding then that.
